attributes.action: Derelict property owners pay higher tax plus implement forced action plan.
attributes.additional_details:
Letting these buildings rot is atrocity when development and investment are an opportunity. Action is required to force change. 


http://www.theguardian.com/society/2014/jan/31/inside-london-billionaires-row-derelict-mansions-hampstead

http://sheffieldoldtownhall.co.uk/

http://www.theurbanexplorer.co.uk/

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=derelict+buildings+uk
attributes.background: Britain has a vast amount of derelict buildings. Ranging from multi-million pound mansions on London's 'Billionaires Row'  to  buildings of cultural/historical significance. Redevelopment is required. Forcing higher tax and action/development plans would  pressure owners towards development/sale.
